title: Doom Bots
body: Will Doom Bots come back this year? And be put in the rotating queue sometime?

replies.body:
I hope so, it is was favorite game mode!

I think the only hard part would be trying to add Champion points and mastery system with it, since you're going against bots.
More than likely. A lot of people are asking for it. My biggest hope for it is that we get some new bots to fight against. lol Ekko Doombot
